record.dc:title: 1RE3 Bell Site 53RE1, Roane County, Tennessee. Mound 3, Burial 53RE1 prior to removal of stone slab covering. Direction northwest.
record.wpa:narrative: Slab covered grave - flat limestone slabs. Wood strips running lengthwise and crosswise between slabs and burials. Vertical posts (2) at NE end. Wood friable. Burials laid on mixed mound earth 1' above O.H.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs 1RE4 [fhm01394], 1RE7 [fhm01395], and 1RE8 [fhm01396].
